subject: Transfer of toll funds to NHAI HQ through TT/RTGS only.
text: #Rriu 7zf4 <THT grfaruT 349 /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 44 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (Ha 9767, #3r 4a87 3k Tnrf 17T74) T "w Authority of India WA_ Extn: 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) fl-5 Tf 6, #rr-10, ETGT, 7 faori-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. NHAIIF&AToll FDR/2007 Dated 12.2.2007 To Project Director, AU PIU / CMU "Ranllina_Tall Hooa). Ambala, Allahabad; Bhubaneshwar, Gwaiior Kotputli, Varanasi, LucknowAL); Nellore, Rajamundary, Srikakulam; Vijayawada(CMU) Vishakhapatanam Subject: Transfer of Toll funds to NHAI HQ through TTIRTGS only: Sir , It is observed that the toll collection proceeds of your  Toll Plazas are being remitted by your office to NHAI HQ through Demand Drafts. This results delay in credit of funds in NHAI Acs. The Audit is adversely pointing out this delay in transit and consequential loss  of interest The funds should therefore be remitted through Telegraphic Transfer or transfer through RTGS. It is requested that the concerned Banks may be advised that the maturity proceeds of the Toll FDR may be remitted in either of the following current   account of NHAI HQ through RTGSIIT under intimation to all concerned , to ensure that  funds are transferred to NHAI Ac on The same of maturity of Toll FDR, to avoid any loss of interest. Bank Name_ RTGS Current Account no: Canara Bank, Rajouri Garden IFSC Code 5819 New Delhi- CNRB 0001386 Syndicate Bank, Transport IFSC Code 90621010000433 Bhawan; New Delhi- SYNB 000 RTGS In case the Banks collecting the toll, are not in position to transfer the funds through RTGSIT , the funds may first be credited in your regular current account and the same should immediately be  remitted to HQ through RTGSITT to ensure that all toll remittances are sent to HQ through RTGSITT only: This procedure may kindly be followed with immediate effect: Yours faithfully JAw T.KChattopadhyay) General Manager & Audit) NHAL day got (Alcs
